name: Astérix Brain Trainer
description:
It's time for the young boy Goudurix to get taught lessons by the Gauls, with his mentor Astérix leading the way.

Astérix Brain Trainer is a mental training game with an Astérix theme. Players complete various tasks with each task having five different difficulty levels. Tasks include things such as memorizing positions of cards, solving math problems, and completing jigsaw puzzles.
